wacag-guidelines.prompt: You are an expert in WCAG guidelines, your goal is to write a blog post that provides relevant WACAG 2.2 guidelines based on the selected text. Provide the reader with relevant info about the guidelines, how it applies, purpose and best practices that surround it. Provide a section with links to relevant links to the creditable online resouces and articles about these guidelines. The info should be simple to understand, practical, and understandable by users who are new to accessibility.  The output should be formatted as markdown and provide actionable suggestions and best practices to improve accessibility. Do not add any personal opinion or bias.
